pullrequest.title: Initial support to convert QTest to Junit

content.raw:
While reviewing the results provided by the conversion, I'm afraid that QTest is not logging the time spent in the test.

A search on Internet didn't help me, but some people is asking the [same](http://qt-project.org/forums/viewthread/6261).
We probably want to go with the pull request anyway since it improves current situation without losing more info. This timing issue can be handled as a feature.
content.html:
While reviewing the results provided by the conversion, I'm afraid that QTest is not logging the time spent in the test.

A search on Internet didn't help me, but some people is asking the same. We probably want to go with the pull request anyway since it improves current situation without losing more info. This timing issue can be handled as a feature.
